thread.title: Suri Cruise Is a Thrill Seeker! Katie Holmes' Daughter Hits Amusement Park With Her Mom and Cousins -- Pics
thread.title_full: Suri Cruise Is a Thrill Seeker! Katie Holmes' Daughter Hits Amusement Park With Her Mom and Cousins -- Pics

author: Leena Tailor
title: Suri Cruise Is a Thrill Seeker! Katie Holmes' Daughter Hits Amusement Park With Her Mom and Cousins -- Pics
text: Suri Cruise Is a Thrill Seeker! Katie Holmes' Daughter Hits Amusement Park With Her Mom and Cousins -- Pics by Leena Tailor 4:33 PM   Suri Cruise Is a Thrill Seeker! Katie Holmes' Daughter Hits Amusement Park With Her Mom and Cousins -- Pics Nothing like a day at the amusement park with your cousins! Suri Cruise spent some quality time hanging with her mom, Katie Holmes , and two older cousins in Santa Monica, California. WATCH: Katie Holmes Looks Just Like Daughter Suri Cruise in Adorable Flashback Photo The family hit Pacific Park on the Santa Monica Pier, where they braved the Pacific Plunge drop ride, a nine-storey tower which lifts riders 150 feet into the air before hurling them back down to earth. “A !” Holmes captioned a pic of the ride, along with the hashtags, “#stomachdrop #sundayfunday #family #love #blessed#gratitude.” A photo posted by Katie Holmes (@katieholmes212) on Feb 5, 2017 at 4:47pm PST The actress also shared a series of candid snaps of the kids, showing her love with hashtags including, “#familytime” and “#blessed.” “Love my #nephews,” she gushed on one pic. Suri was all smiles as she posed with her cuzzies outside Pier Burger, and was also snapped chatting with them on the bike path by the beach. A photo posted by Katie Holmes (@katieholmes212) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:39pm PST A photo posted by Katie Holmes (@katieholmes212) on Feb 5, 2017 at 4:30pm PST A photo posted by Katie Holmes (@katieholmes212) on Feb 5, 2017 at 6:36pm PST The family was also spotted browsing a closeout sale at American Apparel in Studio City on Saturday. WATCH: Katie Holmes and Suri Cruise Can’t Stop Smiling at L.A. Lakers Game According to an eyewitness, Suri helped her mom -- who was wearing one of the store’s button-down shirts -- select items of clothing, pointing out that she already owns many of them! The mother-daughter pair previously enjoyed a theme park date at Disneyland. See more on that fun day out in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
